thread.title: Turkey tells Greece it must take necessary measures to decrease tension in Aegean Sea

title: Turkey tells Greece it must take necessary measures to decrease tension in Aegean Sea
text: February 13, 2018 / 6:49 PM / Updated 37 minutes ago Turkey tells Greece it must take necessary measures to decrease tension in Aegean Sea Reuters Staff 1 Min Read ISTANBUL (Reuters) - Turkey’s Prime Minister Binali Yildirim told Greek Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras in a phone call on Tuesday that Greece needed to take steps to decrease tension in the Aegean sea, a source from the Turkish prime minister’s office said. Relations between the two neighbours have become strained due to a dispute over resources in the eastern Mediterranean and vessels from the two sides colliding near disputed islands. Writing by Ali Kucukgocmen; Editing by Peter Graff
